decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location plan and block plan received on 25/02/2016, existing floor plan received 22/03/2016 and elevations (page 1-3) received on 11/04/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those set out in the application form and approved drawings.

Condition : 4 - The windows formed in both side elevations and any glazing panels to these elevations shall be obscure glazed, non-opening and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
description: Retrospective application for erection of a single storey rear extension
